name: Giant Knight 0.4.11
description:
Third demo for Giant Knight

This one shows off a simple level with a secret.

To switch between Fullscreen and Windowed press F1.

The Game can be played with Keyboard or a Controller

To interact with environment (Chests, Teleporter) press W key or UP on the D-pad.

The Elevator is controlled with W and S / UP and DOWN D-pad.

Controls

WASD / D-pad - movement

J / X - Light Attack

K / B - Heavy Attack

L / A - Jump

Space / Shoulders - Dodge

C / Y - Inventory

To perform air attack, press J in mid air

If you find any bugs or have any suggestions please feel free to leave a comment.

Thank you.
